item.description: Please RSVP! This is lesson number 9: Components of Winning Stocks - Quality & Rising Institutional Sponsorship . Kier McDonough will be presenting. For those of you who don't know, Kier runs Brigos Capital Management on CANSLIM principles and has taught Level I and Level II courses for Investors Business Daily.  If you haven't been to an IBD meetup in a while, please come. Moving the meeting back to MIT, using the IBD provided curriculum and having Kier present is a definite improvement.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: #9 - Components of Winning Stocks - Quality & Rising Institutional Sponsorship
